rename_folder_prompt: Enter new name for the folder:
create_folder_prompt: Enter a name for the new folder:
settings_shortcut_description: Use modifiers like Ctrl, Alt, Shift + a key (e.g., Alt+S).
settings_apps_library_basic_only_hint: Show only everyday applications. Disable to include diagnostics and developer utilities.
auto_instructions_p1: Automations allow you to run commands or open applications using a short keyword.
auto_instructions_step1: Name: A descriptive name for your automation (e.g., "Open Downloads Folder").
auto_instructions_step2: Keyword: A short trigger word (e.g., "dl"). When you type this in the search, the automation will appear.
auto_instructions_step3: Command/Path: The command to execute. This can be a path to a file/folder (e.g., C:\Users\YourUser\Downloads), a URL (e.g., https://google.com), or a system command (e.g., `cmd /c "shutdown /s /t 0"` to shutdown the PC).
wiki_disambiguation_prefix: The query "%s" is ambiguous. Please refine it or use the web search.
wiki_no_summary: No quick summary is available for "%s". Please try the full article or a web search.
error_shortcut_message: Could not register the shortcut '%s'. It might be in use by another application or in an invalid format.
error_shortcut_format: The shortcut format '%s' is invalid. Please use modifiers like Ctrl, Alt, Shift, etc. (e.g., 'Alt+Space').
drag_drop_hint: Drag an app into the Apps window to add it to a folder
subscription_trial_message: Your add-on tools stay unlocked while the subscription is active.
subscription_lab_description: Use the Add-on Lab tab to combine building blocks and tailor FlashSearch to your workflow.
addons_active_description: These add-ons are currently plugged into FlashSearch.
addons_gallery_description: Start with a ready-made module and adapt it to your workflow.
addon_builder_intro: Build features from easy blocks—no coding required.
addon_builder_empty_state: Add blocks to design how your add-on should behave.
addon_builder_error_name_required: Please enter a name for your add-on.
addon_base_clipboard_desc: Start from the classic clipboard layout.
addon_builder_blocks_clipboard_filter_de: Keep only snippets that match keywords or formats.
addon_builder_blocks_text_replace_desc: Swap words or phrases on the fly before they appear.
addon_builder_blocks_pin_items_desc: Keep important entries at the top of the list.
addon_builder_blocks_sync_desc: Share this add-on's data across your devices.
addon_library_clipboard_description: Remember your recent copies with powerful filters.
addon_library_note_description: Capture instant notes and templates beside search.
addon_library_command_description: Queue commands and scripts with one tap.
addon_delete_custom_confirm: Delete this custom add-on? This action cannot be undone.
quick_action_apps_library_description: Open the curated application library in the auxiliary panel.
quick_action_files_description: Browse files and folders without leaving the search window.
quick_action_commands_description: Trigger saved commands, scripts and automations.
quick_action_clipboard_description: Review and manage clipboard history alongside your search results.
quick_action_workflow_gallery_descriptio: Launch a curated workspace combining the most popular automations.
quick_action_research_description: Aggregate facts into a structured brief and sync it with your notes.
quick_action_standup_description: Collect bullet points and send the summary to your team automatically.
quick_action_status_mailer_description: Generate a formatted status email and deliver it through your webhook.
quick_action_ai_scout_description: Analyse incoming snippets with AI and keep the highlights ready.
quick_action_focus_playlist_description: Prepare a playlist and open the media controls with one tap.
quick_action_design_review_description: Translate notes, format feedback and queue a design board.
quick_action_metrics_description: Compile KPIs, transform the data and open your analytics view.
addons_toolbar_description: Choose which buttons live next to the search bar and rearrange them.
addons_toolbar_active_hint: These quick actions appear to the right of the search field.
addons_toolbar_library_hint: Toggle a card to add it to the toolbar or open details to customise.
addons_toolbar_empty: No buttons yet. Add items from the gallery to build your workflow.
workflow_studio_description: Visually connect triggers, processors and actions to craft custom buttons.
workflow_history_empty: No custom workflows yet. Build one to see it listed here.
workflow_panel_library_hint: Drag modules into the canvas or click to add them automatically.
workflow_panel_inspector_hint: Select a module to configure its inputs, outputs and options.
workflow_canvas_empty_description: Combine triggers, processors and actions to automate your day.
workflow_builder_subtitle: Design the logic behind your quick actions by snapping blocks together.
workflow_builder_error_name_required: Enter a name before saving the workflow.
workflow_inspector_empty: Select a module to see its configuration.
workflow_runtime_missing: The workflow attached to this button no longer exists.
workflow_runtime_missing_template: Template is unavailable. Please update the application.
workflow_runtime_unknown_payload: Unable to start the workflow because of an unknown payload.
workflow_template_curated_gallery_descri: Popular automations bundled into a single action.
workflow_template_research_brief_descrip: Collect snippets into a structured report.
workflow_template_daily_standup_descript: Prepare a stand-up summary and send it to your team.
workflow_template_status_email_descripti: Generate and deliver a status update email.
workflow_template_ai_scout_description: Analyse text with AI and store the insights.
workflow_template_focus_playlist_descrip: Open your focus music at the perfect moment.
workflow_template_design_review_descript: Translate feedback and stage a design review board.
workflow_template_metrics_dashboard_desc: Summarise KPIs and open the analytics panel.
workflow_module_clipboard_trigger_descri: Start a workflow whenever something new hits your clipboard.
workflow_module_schedule_trigger_descrip: Fire at a specific time or cadence.
workflow_module_webhook_trigger_descript: Listen for incoming webhooks to kick off the flow.
workflow_module_markdown_formatter_descr: Turn plain text into a structured markdown document.
workflow_module_summary_description: Shorten long passages into concise summaries.
workflow_module_ai_analysis_description: Let FlashSearch analyse text with AI and extract insights.
workflow_module_open_panel_description: Display one of the auxiliary panels when the workflow runs.
workflow_module_run_command_description: Execute a command or script from your system.
workflow_module_send_webhook_description: Send the workflow output to a webhook endpoint.
workflow_module_create_note_description: Save formatted content to a note or document.
